name: Auto-Parts
short:
This is a Responsive MERN-Stack Manufacturer web application.On this site, users can order our products, see their order list & review
        our site. If the user wants any take any product they must be
        authenticated with Gmail, Email . They can also cancel their orders.There is an admin panel where the admin can add more admins, add
        more products, delete any orders, and update users
Tools:
React.js, Firebase, MongoDB, Node.js, Express.js, JWT, react-hook-form,
        React-router-dom, firebase-hook, DaisyUI, Tailwind CSS,
        React-toast, React-query, React-stripe

name: Apple-Warehouse
short: Warehouse Management Application For Apple Store.JWT Implemented to secure REST API.MongoDB used to manage the database of the warehouse
Tools:
React.js, Firebase, MongoDB, Node.js, Express.js, JWT, react-hook-form,
        React-router-dom, firebase-hook, react-bootstrap ,React-toast,
        Axios

name: Move-Home
Tools:
React.js, react-hook-form,
        React-router-dom, DaisyUI, Tailwind CSS,
        React-toast
short: Application to Provide moving Service.React Router Implemented
